================
zc.table changes
================

0.7.0 (2008-05-20)
------------------

- Fixed HTML-encoding of cell contents for ``GetterColumn``.

- Add ``href`` attributes (for MSIE) and fix up JavaScript on Next/Prev links
  for batching.

- Update packaging.

0.6 (2006-09-22)
----------------

Initial release on Cheeseshop.
